pages.text: Semi-Auto is an enchantment added by Terramity.$(br)$(br)This enchantment has different effects depending on the gun. For an automatic, it'll turn the gun semi-automatic and increase damage. For a pump-action shotgun, the shotgun will turn semi-automatic. For a bolt-action sniper rifle, the sniper rifle will turn semi-automatic.$(br)$(br)Max Level: 1
